snippet.title: MUGEN - Game Engine Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey Everyone, this is a trailer for a 2D fighting game engine that allows you to customize it to your liking. Its like playing with Lego bricks in a sense but with "programming!"!

I hope this trailer does inspires you to try your hand at "programming" your own fighting game

Do look into the many tutorials around youtube as its very easy to get started.

If you'd like to start I highly recommend checking out the Mugen Guild Forums here: http://tinyurl.com/cu9ts2b

Thanks for watching!
